items.title: maxnowack/blend: Simple dependency management without Git submodules

items.content_html: A fun side project that serves as an offline alternative to the TDSB Connects app. Built as a Progressive Web App (PWA), it runs locally on your device and doesn’t rely on servers, offering a lightweight, efficient, and reliable experience.
items.title: HassanSattar3/Better-Tdsb-Routine-App: A fun side project that serves as an offline alternative to the TDSB Connects app. Built as a Progressive Web App (PWA), it runs locally on your device and doesn’t rely on servers, offering a lightweight, efficient, and reliable experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js library for reading and writing multiple barcodes on a single image.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: uvarov-frontend/vanilla-calendar-pro: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.

items.content_html: 💎 Lightweight WebApp development library using custom elements
items.title: mantou132/gem: 💎 Lightweight WebApp development library using custom elements

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
items.title: DraouM/StockFlow: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
